attributes.title: Terrifying
attributes.review: In one word. Terrifying. Honestly the amount of fake news and propaganda on this app is 🧚🏻‍♂️🧚🏻‍♂️🧚🏻‍♂️ scary.  Definitely would not recommend to anyone who values human life and connection. Xoxo gossip girl

attributes.title: TikTok is powerful
attributes.review: First of all, Trump is a terrible person, and I don’t now how in the world we have him as a president. Trump, if ur going to ban TikTok, we’re not going down without a fight!!

attributes.title: Spooky💀👻👽🎃
attributes.review:
It’s just a spooky app. When I downloaded it this oompa loompa - looking dude kept appearing on my screen 😦 I asked and ppl said it’s the president???
Spooked the hell out of me, would give 0 stars.

attributes.title: So clunky
attributes.review: It’s overall a really bad app. Takes forever to load anything
